short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click access to all of the library's digital resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From this extension you have one-click access to everything you need for research projects, finding books in our collection, designing projects in The Garage and more! No need to visit the website: everything you need for all of your inquiry and project work is here!
